question:
=C2=A0

p on what hertz and gauss measurments are, however am confused

complete cyc=
les per second and gauss is the strength of an EMF. I guess where I

s=
trength. I may not be making much sense here, but can you tell me where I a=
m

=C2=A0
My answer was that I wasn't entirely sure 
mys=
elf but I think=C2=A0that=C2=A0Hertz measures the wave frequencies of the 
=

gth 
of=C2=A0EMF generated around these wave frequencies. Depending on=C2=
=A0the range 
of hertz, an EMF is generated.
=C2=A0

 check around with 
other people in the field to make sure.

rrect?
